item.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning Nanodegree
item.description: Project 1: Navigation with DQN,Double DQN, Duelling DQN This project involves training an agent to navigate (and collect bananas!) in a large, square world. The result looked like this: link to code: https://github.com/raoshashank/Navigation-using-DQN Project 2: Continouous control with DDPG This project involves training a simulated robot arm to reach a particular given point. The result looked like this: link to code: https://github.com/raoshashank/Continouous-Control-with-DDPG Project 3: Collaboration and Competition This project involves training a simulated robot arm to reach a particular given point.

item.title: Robot Snakes mimic Snakes from Video using Genetic Algorithms
